banner.title: IT Services
banner.subtitle: Modern technology solutions for community development

itService.description: Our IT services department provides cutting-edge technology solutions to support education, administration, and community connectivity initiatives. We leverage modern tools and platforms to enhance operational efficiency and enable digital transformation across all our community programs.

imageSection.title: Technology for Community Empowerment
imageSection.description: We believe that technology should serve as a bridge to connect, educate, and empower our community members. Our IT infrastructure supports various programs including online learning platforms, digital record keeping, and communication systems that keep our community connected.

courses.title: Digital Literacy
courses.description: Basic computer skills and internet usage for all age groups.

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Learn to build websites and web applications using modern technologies.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Basics
courses.description: Essential knowledge to protect personal and organizational data.

courses.title: Data Management
courses.description: Organizing, storing, and retrieving data effectively and securely.

courses.title: Cloud Computing
courses.description: Understanding cloud platforms and services for personal and business use.

courses.title: Digital Marketing
courses.description: Promoting businesses and services through online channels.
